title: [HOLD for payment 2024-08-13] [$250] [Held requests] Partially approved expenses are not GBR'ed in LHN
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: Pre-requisite:
1. Create a workspace and add user A (as a member) and user B (as an admin).
2. More features > Enable workflows > Enable Add Approvals > Set user B as an approver
Steps
1. As user A submit two expenses to the workspace
2. As user B (the approver) navigate to the expense report and hold one of the expenses
3. As user B (the approver) click on the approve option
4. A modal is displayed to approve the full report amount or just the pending expense
5. Approve the pending expense (Submitted expense that is not on hold)
6. When the action is completed observe the LHN and workspace chat report.

Expected result: A new report is created with the expense on hold and is GBR’ed in the LHN (green dot)

Actual result: None
